body: This is released back in March though, like Love Hame (#409668) and it's just compilation of the short stories previously released in magazines. Ebi got a table for the Summer Comiket in August, so TS Revenge 2 should be released there. <https://twitter.com/not_ebi/status/1535183424302227458>

Well Ebi ever get around to making the Second Chapter of "TS Fukushuu Revenge?" Seriously finish your damn stories before moving forward hentai writers (or just don't make a chapter story in general then! I can get shorter side stuff before the next, But DAMN is the waiting killing me LOL)
